entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:12 a.m. PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, 2.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 3:00 AM MST Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Widespread smoke. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Widespread smoke. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Widespread smoke. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023
